About Us

Our Story

"Libaslegrace" is a fusion of modest clothing (libas) with an element of grace and elegance. Established in 2024, our brand emerged from the collective struggle of many Muslim women seeking to embrace modesty without compromising on elegance. "Verily, Allah is beautiful and He loves beauty," we understand that modesty is the crown of a Muslim woman. Libaslegrace is dedicated to illuminating Allah's message and spreading positivity through the art of modest dressing.

Our Mission

Our mission at Libaslegrace is to create a world where every woman feels comfortable and confident. We aim to inspire women to embrace modest wear as a source of empowerment and self-expression. Through our carefully curated collections, we provide a wardrobe that aligns with the values of modesty while offering chic and stylish options for every occasion.

Our Products

Your decision to wear modest wear deserves to be celebrated with products that genuinely make your life easier, make you feel more comfortable and confident, and allow you to express your personal style. We take immense pride in using only the highest quality materials, precisely constructed to last.

  • Abaya
  • All Over
  • Hijab
  • Hijab pins
  • Hijab magnets
  • Hijab underscarves
  • Scrunchies

Our Team

We are a dynamic team of individuals from diverse backgrounds, united by a shared passion for our mission. Our commitment is to create a world where every woman can feel comfortable and confident in accordance with the laws described by Allah (SWT). Guided by principles of openness, respect, growth, creativity, and fun, the Libaslegrace team is dedicated to making a positive impact in the world of modest fashion.

); }; export default AboutUsPage;
